MID NIGHT BALL

A adventure game about the story of a ball.

THE STORY

The main character named Kerri from the town of(not yet named)grow with uncle .his uncle trained both him and his brother, they both love each other Kerri and his brother (not yet named), Kerri brother stole the pump of life that changed the whole village, that's where the story begin or began. what ever

HISTORY OF MIDNIGHT BALL

M.N.B was the first project in world of game develop, it started like hey you are creative right?open your laptop go to the game engine and start creating something that's how the M.N.B was formed, just placing random item on the scene hoping it will turn to actual game of course it actually turn  from M.N.B 1.0 v to 2.0 v to the current version M.N.B 3.0 v  M.N.B 1.0 v was created with "Game factory" that's my very first Game engine used. The second version M.N.B 2.0 v, this was when i step up a little bit in design, but these game engine keep repeating one thing which kind of hmmm..... and that is "this engine is limitless you you can do anything (2D) in this engine" that's a lie then a meet this dude online that create with the ultimate 2D game engine Gdevelop, i can't wait to try it out at that point, i was like is this True  limitless 2D engine. to cut the story short it was the best i will say then i made the 3rd version of M.N.B 3.0 v which is more in hence and details and also the worst mistake i did made in the world of game creation, i do; like i have learnt 2D game making right?yeah but not in Gdevelop (remember i made version 1 in Game factory and version 2 in click team fashion)click team fusion is like the advance of game factory to cut it short i don't learn Gdevelop before  making a game in it.     

   NEW WAY TO PLAY (i will adjust in the next update)

Controls

  • up arrow  ~move up
  • down arrow ~move down
  • right arrow ~move right
  • left arrow ~move left
  • Lalt or Ralt ~special 
  • space ~ dash
  • arrow + space to dash with direction
  • k ~ pick

Thank you for downloading and play
